Multiple sources: The expert's verdict mentions that the claim was shared on multiple fake news sites, including Now8News and Viral Covert. This indicates that the claim was not limited to a single source, adding to its authenticity.
Specific details: The claim provides specific details about the lottery winner, Justin Green or Justin Reiter, his actions, and the procedure he attempted. These details make the claim more believable as they add a level of specificity that would be harder to fabricate.
Image consistency: Both versions of the claim feature the same image of a doctor allegedly involved in the incident. This consistency in the image used across different sources adds to the authenticity of the claim.
Personal testimonies: The claim includes statements from friends and family members of the lottery winner, providing personal testimonies about his actions and intentions. These testimonies add a human element to the claim and make it more plausible.
